title: Denali National Park & Preserve: Professional Development
body: Professional Development        Teacher-Ranger-Teachers Hey teachers - want to spend a summer living and working in a national park? This is the program for you - work as a park ranger for the summer, then bring the stories and lessons of Denali back to your students.  All Teacher-Ranger-Teachers       Be a Teacher-Ranger-Teacher in Denali Learn More     Teacher Workshops Shoulder-to-shoulder with other teachers, scientists and specialists we experiment with activities for your classroom, and discuss educational methods, tools, and resources. Professional development credit is provided by the University of Alaska. All Teacher Workshops   Teacher Workshops    Teacher Workshops Learn More
